author: Ashley Carman
title: Snapchat use is, predictably, way up with everyone home and staring at screens
description: Snap released its Q1 2020 earnings and said it grew its daily active user base by 11 million in one quarter. It did see a decrease in revenue, which might continue as advertisers tighten up their budgets during the pandemic.
content:
But now the companys competing for limited advertising dollars
Illustration by Alex Castro / The Verge
Snap has been building a product optimized for the pandemic. It features more original content than ever before, as well as games and augmented reality le… [+2413 chars]
